docs.snippet: A lawyer who specialized in end-of-life matters has been acquitted in the death of her millionaire father, whom prosecutors claimed she had removed from life support by forging power of attorney documents after he survived an attack at his lake ho...
docs.lead_paragraph: A lawyer who specialized in end-of-life matters has been acquitted in the death of her millionaire father, whom prosecutors claimed she had removed from life support by forging power of attorney documents after he survived an attack at his lake house that claimed his girlfriend's life.

headline.main: Missouri Lawyer Acquitted in Killings of Dad, His Girlfriend
headline.print_headline: Missouri Lawyer Acquitted in Killings of Dad, His Girlfriend
